00002 /*! _zrovector*zgbmatrix operator */
00003 inline _zrovector operator*(const _zrovector& vec, const zgbmatrix& mat)
00004 {VERBOSE_REPORT;
00005 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00006   if(vec.l!=mat.m){
00007     ERROR_REPORT;
00008     std::cerr << "These vector and matrix can not make a product." << std::endl
00009               << "Your input was (" << vec.l << ") * (" << mat.m << "x" << mat.n << ")." << std::endl;
00010     exit(1);
00011   }
00012 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00013   
00014   zrovector newvec(mat.n);
00015   zgbmv_( 'T', mat.m, mat.n, mat.kl, mat.ku, comple(1.0,0.0),
00016           mat.array, mat.kl+mat.ku+1, vec.array, 1, comple(0.0,0.0), newvec.array, 1 );
00017   
00018   vec.destroy();
00019   return _(newvec);
00020 }
